objects.name: Dynamic Data Exchange Mitigation
objects.description:
Ensure Protected View is enabled. (Citation: Microsoft Protected View)

Registry keys specific to Microsoft Office feature control security can be set to disable automatic DDE/OLE execution. (Citation: Microsoft DDE Advisory Nov 2017) (Citation: BleepingComputer DDE Disabled in Word Dec 2017)

external_references.source_name: BleepingComputer DDE Disabled in Word Dec 2017
external_references.description: Cimpanu, C. (2017, December 15). Microsoft Disables DDE Feature in Word to Prevent Further Malware Attacks. Retrieved December 19, 2017.
Microsoft. (n.d.). What is Protected View?. Retrieved November 22, 2017.
Microsoft. (2017, November 8). Microsoft Security Advisory 4053440 - Securely opening Microsoft Office documents that contain Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) fields. Retrieved November 21, 2017.
